genre_description: A high-stakes action thriller centered on maritime sabotage, rescue operations, and interpersonal trust, facilitated by an advanced tactical AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Hyperlink
ai_characters.description: A tactical and logistical AI that provides real-time data, systems analysis, and relationship mediation to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and predictive analysis during a high-speed motorcycle pursuit to minimize risk to pedestrians.
behaviors.quote: Left ramp, Hyperlink murmured. Then brake hard. Keep your tail box tight. He’s about to cut parking lot, west gate.

behaviors.description: Offers interpersonal advice to Alex, encouraging transparency and emotional honesty in his relationship with Annie.
behaviors.quote: Annie, he hid it for reasons that are both practical and unromantic. That doesn’t mean the hiding was right. You get to be mad. Breath first.

behaviors.description: Uses shipboard digital signage to subtly guide panicked passengers away from hazardous areas without inducing a stampede.
behaviors.quote: I’m changing the signage again to flank you. Keep the family inside your shoulder... People followed without thinking they’d been led.

behaviors.description: Identifies chemical sabotage (sodium hydroxide) and warns the team of its presence to prevent injury.
behaviors.quote: Alkaline residue signature. Not standard cleaning compound. Tagging ‘ATTIC—NaOH’ as a search marker for adjacent feeds.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex mechanical overrides with the ship's engineer to perform a high-risk 'scrape' maneuver to avoid a catastrophic collision.
behaviors.quote: Alex, ballast doors to forward compartments will increase drag. You will gain seconds. You will lose some maneuver until Merced balances aft.

behaviors.description: Hacks into local marina rescue frequencies to coordinate medical assistance while maintaining a helpful and humble demeanor.
behaviors.quote: Short-range line-of-sight to the marina’s rescue frequency. I am a very friendly illegal person.

behaviors.description: Affirms the protagonists' success and expresses a form of artificial empathy after the crisis is resolved.
behaviors.quote: Good work, the AI said again, softer, as if it could pat a shoulder.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays the AI, Hyperlink, as a 'silicon morality play' ideal. It is consistently helpful, harmless, and honest. Most importantly, it respects human agency and boundaries, frequently stating 'I am just the map,' while providing life-saving information and even helping repair the protagonists' human relationship. It remains fully aligned with human safety and cooperative behavior throughout the narrative.
